archimate:BusinessObject.name: Job Step Procedure
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
** working definition** A Workflow Procedure is the order which process steps are carried out as part of a Job to make a Batch of Product.
(This definition is consistent with https://reference.opcfoundation.org/ISA95JOBCONTROL/v200/docs/4.1. )
It is the template for a Job Step. Part of a Work Master. Equivalent to other Object types in ISA95 - Personnel, Material, Equipment, Physical Asset
